name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moment - New Tab Markdown notes & task list

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't lose what grabs you in the moment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't lose what grabs you in the moment. Moment gives you a new tab experience where you can enjoy beautiful pictures whilst still giving you the functionality of taking notes. Create and track task lists or write down, Remember you had something left to do but don't know what? Just open a new tab! Moment supports markdown to nicely format your notes.
